{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking which option will NOT decrease the transmission of HIV from mother to child. Since the options are related to pregnancy and childbirth, I will focus on the documents that provide relevant information.

From the 'Familial 21/22 translocation' document, there is no mention of HIV or mother-to-child transmission.

The other two documents deal with unrelated topics: the first discusses treatment outcomes for alcoholics, while the second describes malaria prevention measures for an airline. Neither document provides information relevant to this question.

The 'Maternal age and incidence of schizophrenia in the Republic of Ireland' and 'Sex preferences for offspring among men in the western area of Sierra Leone' documents are also unrelated to HIV transmission.
